name: hestapeysa (icelandic sweater with horses)
notes:
sweater with horses

sizes:
children‘s (128 cm) (women‘s: men‘s)

chest: 
86 (109:119) cm 

length to underarm:
48 (67:71) cm 

sleeve length to underarm:
31 (44:49) cm 

materials 
létt-lopi ▪ 50 g balls 
a-0053, acorn heather or 
a-0057, grey heather 5 (8:10) 
b-0051, white 2 (3:3) 
c-0005, black heather 1 (2:2)
 
5 mm (us 8) and 3 ½ mm (us 4) circular needles 40 
and 80 cm  

5 mm (us 8) and 3 ½ mm (us 4) double pointed 
needles 

gauge 
18 sts og 24 rows = 10 x 10 cm measured over st st 
using 5 mm needles. check gauge and adjust needle size if necessary.
